full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): #, ,DPAL RDO RJE SEMS DPA' THUGS KYI SGRUB PA'I BSNYEN SGRUB PHRIN LAS KYI CHO GA RNAM GROL LAM BZANG ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @052A *, ,(DPAL RDO RJE SEMS DPA'I THUGS KYI SGRUB PA'I BSNYEN SGRUB PHRIN LAS KYI CHO GA RNAM PAR GROL BA'I LAM BZANG ZHES BYA BA, RIG PA 'DZIN PA GYUR MED RDO RJES @052B AO RGYAN SMIN GROL GLING GI BLA BRANG CHOS 'KHOR LHUN POR SBYAR BA'I YI GE PA NI DGE SBYONG BLO GSAL RGYA MTSOS BGYIS PA'O, ,DGE'O, ,SLAR YANG KHRI CHEN RIN CHEN RNAM RGYAL GYIS MDZAD PA'I LHAN THABS MDZES BRGYAN NYID KYANG DKYUS SU BRIS NAS ZHI CHEN BLA BRANG DU BAR DU BSGRUBS SO, ,DGE'O, ,ZHUS, ,)
